title: INSANELY Smooth pixel ATTACK Animation Tutorial
description:
WISHLIST my new game √ñrn√∂ga: Idle: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3536530/rnga_Idle/

A smooth animation tutorial. Condensed version to give viewers a peak at what my full tutorials provide! I make monthly pixel art/animation tutorials that I release on itch/for my patreons.

Buy my game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2317880/Bullet_Bunny/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/penusbmic
Itch Game Assets: https://penusbmic.itch.io/?ac=PG2UmUiNXvG
Unity Asset Store: https://prf.hn/click/camref:1100l3XzpU/destination:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/the-dark-series-the-swordmaster-camp-tileset-227617
Discord: https://discord.gg/AqCByaFWrv
music by me: https://soundcloud.com/penusbmic

What Pixel Software do I use?
I use Aseprite on Desktop and Pixquare on the go & in bed!
Use Code PENUSBMIC to get 30% off Pixquare (IOS): https://www.pixquare.art/

00:00 Intro
00:32 Designing Character
01:48 Setting Up Keyframes
05:49 Adding In-between frames (idle to battle stance)
08:50 Adding In-between frames (first Slash)
10:45 Adding In-between frames (anticipation of heavy slam)
11:35 Adding In-between frames (final heavy slam)
14:38 adding In-between frames (return to idle stance)
17:22 Adding VFX (Electricity)
